context: Hi how are you? What kind of movies do you enjoy?
Great! Thanks. I like epic historical pieces. And recommendations?
resp: I recently saw Black Panther (2018) and it was amazing I also really enjoyed both Guardians of the Galaxy (2014) and Guardians (2017) How about Schindler's List (1993) have you seen that? I hear its hard to watch but a great production of it.
